text: (ya kaaphiron ke aamaal kee misaal) us bade gahare dariya kee taarikiyon kee see hai- jaise ek lahar usake oopar doosaree lahar usake oopar abr (tah ba tah) dhoke hue ho (garaz) taarikiyaan hai ki ek se oopar ek (umadee) chalee aatee hain (isee tarah se) ki agar koi shakhs apana haath nikaale to (shiddat taareekee se) use dekh na sake aur jise khud khuda hee ne (hidaayat kee) raushanee na dee ho to (samajh lo ki) usake lie kaheen koee raushanee nahin hai
